title: Application Developer-SAP ABAP HANA
description:
**Introduction**
 A career in IBM Consulting is built on long\\-term client relationships and close collaboration worldwide. You’ll work with leading companies across industries, helping them shape their hybrid cloud and AI journeys. With support from our strategic partners, robust IBM technology, and Red Hat, you’ll have the tools to drive meaningful change and accelerate client impact. At IBM Consulting, curiosity fuels success. You’ll be encouraged to challenge the norm, explore new ideas, and create innovative solutions that deliver real results. Our culture of growth and empathy focuses on your long\\-term career development while valuing your unique skills and experiences.
   

  

**Your Role And Responsibilities**
 As an Application Developer specializing in SAP ABAP HANA, you will design, develop, and support application solutions with a focus on the HANA version of Advanced Business Application Programming (ABAP). You will work on designing, developing, and re\\-engineering highly complex application components, integrating software packages, programs, and reusable objects residing on multiple platforms. Your primary responsibilities will include:
   

  

* Develop Application Solutions: Design, develop, and support application solutions with a focus on HANA version of ABAP, ensuring high\\-quality and efficient solutions that meet business requirements.
* Integrate Software Packages: Integrate software packages, programs, and reusable objects residing on multiple platforms, utilizing knowledge of SAP HANA Technical Concept and Architecture.
* Re\\-engineer Application Components: Re\\-engineer highly complex application components to optimize performance and efficiency, applying Code Performance Rules and Guidelines for SAP HANA.
* Utilize Development Tools: Leverage ABAP Development Tools (ADT) and HANA Studio for data modeling and development, ensuring effective use of tools and technologies.
* Ensure Data Services: Develop and implement ABAP Core Data Services, Database Procedures, and Text Search, ensuring seamless data integration and management.


**Preferred Education**
 Master's Degree
   

  

**Required Technical And Professional Expertise**
* Exposure to SAP ABAP HANA: Experience working with HANA version of Advanced Business Application Programming (ABAP), including designing, developing, and supporting application solutions.
* Knowledge of SAP HANA Technical Concept and Architecture: Familiarity with SAP HANA Technical Concept and Architecture, including data modeling using HANA Studio and integration of software packages, programs, and reusable objects.
* Proficiency in ABAP Development Tools: Experience working with ABAP Development Tools (ADT) and Code Performance Rules and Guidelines for SAP HANA.
* Understanding of Data Modeling and Integration: Exposure to data modeling using HANA Studio and integration of data services, including ABAP Core Data Services, Database Procedures, and Text Search.
* Familiarity with HANA Live Models Consumption: Basic understanding of HANA Live models consumption and ALV on HANA.


**Preferred Technical And Professional Experience**
* Working Knowledge of ADBC: Experience with ADBC, including its application in SAP HANA environments, would be beneficial for this role.
* Familiarity with Native SQL: Exposure to Native SQL, including its use in SAP HANA, would be advantageous in designing and developing application solutions.
* Understanding of HANA Text Search: Basic understanding of HANA Text Search, including its integration with ABAP Core Data Services, would be valuable in this position.
